name: Windows Meterpreter (Reflective Injection), Hidden Bind TCP Stager
author: skape <mmiller@hick.org>
sf <stephen_fewer@harmonysecurity.com>
OJ Reeves
hdm <x@hdm.io>
Borja Merino <bmerinofe@gmail.com>
description:
Inject the Meterpreter server DLL via the Reflective Dll Injection payload (staged). Requires Windows XP SP2 or newer.

Listen for a connection from a hidden port and spawn a command shell to the allowed host.
